label: ham
subject: heretical thoughts was Re: Speakup dropped from Ubuntu
body: 10 (return) [ See Julian apud Cyril, l. vi. p. 206, l. viii. p. 253, 262. ÒYou persecute,Ó says he, Òthose heretics who do not mourn the dead man precisely in the way which you approve.Ó He shows himself a tolerable theologian; but he maintains that the Christian Trinity is not derived from the doctrine of Paul, of Jesus, or of Moses.]
